Articles.Content:
Introducing the single stage to orbit space plane I have designated the phoenix.

With 2 SABRE engines, 6 hidden air intakes. a double layered wing and a lot of fuel, this pretty birdy will not disappoint even the most critical pilot.

I thought the name quite apt as many a 'simulations' ended very quickly with lots of fire and boom

Sitting ever so quietly on the tarmac, her true power in underestimated. With a minimum take off speed of about 45m/s she is truly agile.

I have been able to get her up to 1100m/s while under 15km , Yes not very efficient, and Yes it did explode shortly after.

This post is quite short as I truly don't know what to write, it is my first post after all, (although i've held this account for over 2 years).

Hope you all enjoy my baby, craft files are available if anyone would like it.

Here's some more images if you like: http://imgur.com/gallery/kIdFl

Edited November 9, 2015 by Achilles
Image update
I like it How much dV in total?
That's a lot of part clipping going on.
